name: Locating more than one customer using a combination of several criteria

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier

When I locate a customer using the following criteria:
| phoneNumberPrefix | phoneNumber | type |
| 01 | 6422133 | Personal |

children.description: Locate by data: | phoneNumberPrefix | phoneNumber | type | | 01 | 6422133 | Personal |

testSteps.description:
Then the following customers should be returned:
| cifKey | customerName | addressLine1 | addressLine2 | addressLine3 | addressLine4 | addressLine5 | dateOfBirth |
| 0100000930019836000 | JON B JOVI | BLAKBURN | TALLAGHT |  |  |  | 1957-08-22 |

children.description: Validate response: | cifKey | customerName | addressLine1 | addressLine2 | addressLine3 | addressLine4 | addressLine5 | dateOfBirth | | 0100000930019836000 | JON B JOVI | BLAKBURN | TALLAGHT | | | | 1957-08-22 |

userStory.storyName: Locate a customer by personal details and Reg Number
userStory.narrative:
In order to find information relevant to a specific customer,as an S&A working on a tablet, 
I want to be able to locate a customer by either: registration number, phone number, card number or
by a combination of name and date of birth.

title: Locating more than one customer using a combination of several criteria

tags.name: Locate a customer by personal details and Reg Number
